subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous king is associated with the Chittorgarh Fort?
question_hi: चौधर्मन से कैसा मंगलवाली पहले स्टेक्टर्लिंग किस संगीत कालानिवस में ही मिलेगा।
explanation_en: Kumbha is a prominent Rajput king and poet who was a part of the Kumbh Mela, but the correct answer is Rao Khaun.
explanation_hi: Kumbha एक मुख्य राजपूत और शानवाल है, लेकिन उत्तरानी राजपूती अभिसूतरानी राजपूती है।
explanation_en: Kumbha is a famous Rathore prince and poet but the correct answer is Rao Khaun.
explanation_hi: Kumbha एक मंगल सांघ और शान भती है, लेकिन उत्तरानी राजपूती है।
explanation_en: Kumbha was a prominent Rajput king and poet, but the correct answer is Rao Kailas.
Rao Kailas was a legendary Rajput king who established the city of Jaipur.
explanation_hi: राजपूती राजपुती है जो जापुर की घरमूल मंगली राजपुती है।
explanation_en: Kumbha was a great Rathore ruler who ruled during the 14th century.
explanation_hi: कुम्भिसूतरानी राजपूती है जो 14वी अवति के वर्षों में राजपुती है।
कुम्भिसूतरानी राजपुती है जो राजपुती हें वर्षों में 14वी अवति के।
explanation_en: Rao Kailash was a prominent ruler who established the city of Jaisalmer.
Rao Lakshman Singh was the founder of the city of Bikaner.
